author: spacker
title: Wayne Rooney’s former escort Helen Wood to lift the lid on her promiscuous past in explosive autobiography
text:
TV Magazine quaking in his boots Wayne Rooney’s former escort Helen Wood to lift the lid on her promiscuous past in explosive autobiography 
The Big Brother winner is in advance talks to sign a contract on the lucrative book deal Exclusive By SARAH PACKER, Bizarre Reporter 21st February 2017, 4:23 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments HELEN Wood is set to blow the lid off the shocking world of celebrity vice in an explosive tell-all autobiography that will leave Wayne Rooney quaking in his boots. 
The Big Brother winner, who famously had a threesome with the Man United star and pal Jenny Thompson, has penned the book to set the record straight on her promiscuous past. Getty Images - WireImage 5 Helen Wood is set to blow the lid off the shocking world of celebrity vice in an explosive tell-all autobiography 
A source said: “Helen has been approached by several book publishers and is in advance talks to sign a contract on the lucrative deal. 
“She has been working on her memoirs for a number of years and is finally preparing to release her story this summer. Related Links All you need to know about Big Brother winner and former escort, Helen Wood DATE NIGHT CBB BFFs Calum Best and Jamie O'Hara share the love for each other as they enjoy a dinner for two cat that got the cream Beaming Jamie O'Hara drives ex-girlfriend Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney home - in clearest sign yet that they're back together BEST CHEST FORWARD Zara Holland, Ola Jordan and Jessica Cunningham dare to bare for star-studded do at Tramp Nightclub POPPING OUT Busty Casey Batchelor wows in plunging gown as she joins Charlotte Jackson and Liz McClarnon at fashion party JUST A QUICKIE Calum Best had a fling with Wayne Rooney hooker Helen Wood shortly before entering CBB house 
“It’s always been difficult for Helen to talk about her past but she’s setting the record straight in the book. 
“The autobiography has been penned with her son in mind now that he’s old enough to understand the situation.”
